desc: Vigour8 is a Luxury SLS and Paraben Free Shower gel made with 100% all natural ingredients. The finest botanicals in the world provide our best smelling body wash as well as protection from infections in high sweat conditions. Avoid sensitive skin from frequent showering and suitable as part of treatment for dry skin.

layout.text: As Featured in The Daily Mail, The Daily Mirror, The Independant , The Guardian, Coach Magazine, Athletics Weekly, The Metro and Many More!
